Package org.apache.zab

An implementation of ZooKeeper Atomic Broadcast.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Election
    Interface for the leader election implementation.
    Election.ElectionCallback
    Interface used by election.
    Log
    Interface of manipulating transaction log.
    Log.LogIterator
    Interface of iterating the transaction log.
    RequestProcessor
    Interface for request processor.
    ServerState
    An interface used to provide useful information for leader election.
    StateMachine
    The state machine interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AckProcessor
    Accepts acknowledgment from peers and broadcasts COMMIT message if there're any committed transactions.
    CommitProcessor
    This class is used to deliver committed transaction.
    DaemonThreadFactory
    The factory for creating daemon thread.
    DummyLog
    Mock in-memory log, used for testing purpose only.
    FileUtils
    A static class that contains file-related utility methods.
    MessageBuilder
    Helper class used for creating protobuf messages.
    Participant
    Participant of a Zab ensemble.
    PeerHandler
    Handles peer connection.
    PreProcessor
    This processor is used to let clients to convert requests into transaction and hands the transaction to BroadcastProcessor to broadcast to all peers.
    QuorumZab
    Quorum zab implementation.
    Request
    Encapsulates the request needs to be processed by RequestProcessor.
    RoundRobinElection
    Simply choose the leader in a round robin way.
    SimpleLog
    This class implements the Log interface.
    SimpleLog.SimpleLogIterator
    An implementation of iterator for iterating the log.
    SingleNodeZab
    The implementation of single node Zab.
    SyncProposalProcessor
    This class manages the logic synchronizing the transactions to disk.
    Transaction
    Transaction.
    Zab
    Abstract class for Zab implementation.
    ZabConfig
    Simple wrapper on Properties, provides a way to query configuration.
    Zxid
    Simple implementation of Zxid.

Package org.apache.zab Description

An implementation of ZooKeeper Atomic Broadcast.
